div.p: Constellation Schools provides every child an opportunity to obtain an excellent education built on a foundation of character education for life long success.

p.span: Please click the following link to view weekly updates, assignments, and other information provided by your teachers. There's also access to a virtual career fair.

strong.span:
Call Center for COVID-19/Coronavirus
Ohio Department of Health
1-833-4-ASK-ODH
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
For the general public regarding questions about Coronavirus

strong.span:
COVID CareLine for Mental Health Support
Ohio Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services
1-800-720-9616
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM
This toll-free, confidential careline provides emotional support to individuals who may be struggling to cope with current challenges in their lives.

br.span: Please click the following link to view resources provided by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the Ohio Department of Health regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19), including multilingual resources.

div.h1: From the Desk of Principal Millett...

div.p: Welcome to Constellation Schools: Lorain Community Elementary and Middle! For the past 18 years, our school has been a proud community member to the City of Lorain and Lorain families. “Once a Bulldog, always a Bulldog!”

Our academic success is one of the main reasons our families choose to send their children to our school. We have a dedicated staff that engages our students learning and show a passion for education. Lorain Community Elementary provides all our students with an opportunity to use technology in the classroom. These are the skills that can be used for college preparation or beyond school in their adult lives. We strive to make our students and families feel like they are a part of a strong team and have a positive educational experience. Lorain Community Middle has a competitive sports program for boys/girls basketball and volleyball. Constellation Schools has also been named Top Workplaces by the The Plain Dealer for two consecutive years, 2018 and 2019.
If you would like to learn more about Constellation Schools: Lorain Community Elementary or Middle, please contact the school office at 440.204.2130 to schedule a school tour.
We look forward to meeting you!

p.br: SaferOH tip line will allow students and adults to anonymously share information with school officials and law enforcement about threats to student safety - whether that involved threatened mass incident or harm of a single student.

div.p: Constellation Schools: Lorain Community Elementary does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies:
